SERVICES_SECTION.TITLE: Who are we?
SERVICES_SECTION.SUBTITLE: We are here to empower entrepreneurs
SERVICES_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: NmoHub was established to bridge the gap faced by startups from the idea stage to market entry.
SERVICES_SECTION.VISIONARIES_DESC: We believe that entrepreneurs with great ideas deserve every opportunity to turn their vision into reality.
SERVICES_SECTION.STARTUP_SUPPORT_DESC: We work side-by-side with entrepreneurs to launch and grow their startups, from concept to execution.
SERVICES_SECTION.NETWORKS_DESC: We connect founders to investors and unlock the power of Nomo’s local and global network to scale ventures.

PROJECT_SECTION.TITLE: Find the Right Program for You
PROJECT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: If you want to scale your business, we have a program for you. No matter what stage you are at in your entrepreneurial journey, we have the resources that fit your growth phase.
PROJECT_SECTION.INCUBATION_DESC: Grow your startup into a viable business

STARTED_SECTION.TITLE: Let's work together
STARTED_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Join us at NmoHub
STARTED_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Let’s build your dream together by supporting innovation, growth, and entrepreneurship.

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Who We Are
HERO_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Achieve more, grow more, and accomplish more Transform your ideas into achievements
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: NmoHub was born from a passion for entrepreneurship and a commitment to ambitious minds. If you have the drive but lack the support, guidance, or resources to get started, we believe in you.

MISSION_SECTION.TITLE: Our Mission, Vision & Purpose
MISSION_SECTION.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: To empower aspiring entrepreneurs to achieve sustainable success by providing a supportive environment that fosters innovation and stimulates the growth of startups.
MISSION_SECTION.VISION_DESCRIPTION: To be the first choice for entrepreneurs and innovators in Saudi Arabia and to become a globally leading center for entrepreneurship.
MISSION_SECTION.PURPOSE_DESCRIPTION: To build a cohesive and innovative entrepreneurial community by offering professional services, including training, mentoring, technical support, and investor engagement, contributing to the realization of Saudi Vision 2030.

BELIEVE_OBJECTIVES_SECTION.TITLE: Our Objectives
OBJECTIVES: Develop entrepreneurial skills and enhance capabilities to achieve sustainability.
Support innovation and turn ideas into successful business ventures.
Boost the contribution of startups to national economic growth.
Facilitate partnerships between entrepreneurs, investors, and institutions.

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Our Programs
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Every startup is unique. That’s why we offer a range of programs designed to meet your needs and help you grow—no matter where you are
HERO_SECTION.QUESTION: Are you ready to achieve more?

INCUBATION_SECTION.TITLE: Because a successful company starts with a strong foundation
INCUBATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: The Incubation Program focuses on building a solid framework for your startup, based on eight key pillars that cover all an entrepreneur’s needs.

BENEFITS.title: Build a sustainable startup
BENEFITS.description: Master the right methodology to establish an agile, effective business model.

BENEFITS.title: Grasp core entrepreneurial concepts
BENEFITS.description: Understand the fundamental principles of entrepreneurship and apply them to your project.

BENEFITS.title: Expand your network
BENEFITS.description: Learn how to develop strong connections that support your venture’s growth.

BENEFITS.title: Align expertise with your product
BENEFITS.description: Bridge the gap between your experience and market demands through your entrepreneurial product.

BENEFITS.title: Design and implement a business model
BENEFITS.description: Navigate the journey from design to successful execution of your business model.

BENEFITS.title: Form a startup team
BENEFITS.description: Understand essential aspects of entrepreneurship and team formation.

BENEFITS.title: Business modeling & market strategy
BENEFITS.description: Learn how to structure your business and develop effective go-to-market strategies and entrepreneurial marketing.

BENEFITS.title: Finance fundamentals for entrepreneurs
BENEFITS.description: Get acquainted with financial and accounting basics that support informed business decisions.

ACCELERATION_SECTION.TITLE: Focus on growth
ACCELERATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: The Acceleration Program aims to enhance success rates, scale operations, and improve sustainability by providing key resources, mentorship, and funding.

BENEFITS.title: Mentoring
BENEFITS.description: Access experienced consultants and coaches across management, finance, tech, legal, and marketing to support strategic decisions.

BENEFITS.title: Funding
BENEFITS.description: Assistance in preparing investment profiles, business plans, and financial models; training in pitching, fundraising, and scaling.

BENEFITS.title: Workshops & Training
BENEFITS.description: Specialized courses covering digital marketing, finance, operations, team management, and more to build entrepreneurial skills.

BENEFITS.title: Legal & Administrative Support
BENEFITS.description: Help with company registration, intellectual property, contracts, taxes, and regulatory advice.

BENEFITS.title: Networking
BENEFITS.description: Connect with potential investors, partners, and suppliers through organized events like exhibitions, seminars, and networking meetups.

BENEFITS.title: Marketing Support
BENEFITS.description: Strategy development, brand building, digital campaigns, and awareness-raising for your product or service.

BENEFITS.title: Infrastructure
BENEFITS.description: Access to offices or co-working spaces, reducing costs and fostering collaboration and creativity.

BENEFITS.title: Technology Resources
BENEFITS.description: Access to current tools, software, and technologies to improve operations and product development.

BENEFITS.title: Growth Support
BENEFITS.description: Assistance expanding into new local or international markets, including logistics, regulatory, and marketing support.

STARTED_SECTION.TITLE: Start a New Chapter
STARTED_SECTION.SUB_TITLE: Give your idea the support it needs
STARTED_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: All our programs are designed to provide the support your startup needs to thrive—from idea through growth to sustainable success. If you’re unsure which program fits your stage and goals, our team is here to guide you toward the best choice

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: FAQ's
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: If you’re curious about our programs, how we operate, or what it takes to join,

QUESTIONS.question: What types of startups does Numo Hub support?
QUESTIONS.answer: Numo Hub supports a wide range of startups across various sectors, including tech, education, health, commerce, and services—provided the ideas are innovative and scalable.

QUESTIONS.question: What is the duration of the programs?
QUESTIONS.answer: Program durations vary depending on the type, but typically range from 8 to 16 weeks, with ongoing support during the growth phase.

QUESTIONS.question: Do I need a fully developed product to apply?
QUESTIONS.answer: No, you don’t need a fully developed product. You can apply with a clear idea or a prototype, as long as you have a strong vision and a plan to develop it.

QUESTIONS.question: What kind of mentorship can I expect?
QUESTIONS.answer: You will receive mentorship from experts in entrepreneurship, business development, marketing, technology, and fundraising. This includes one-on-one sessions and group workshops.

QUESTIONS.question: How does Numo Hub help with funding?
QUESTIONS.answer: Numo Hub helps by connecting you with investors, offering opportunities to pitch to investment networks, and supporting you in preparing for funding rounds and building strong pitch decks.

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Contact Us
HERO_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Grow Your Business Starts Here
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Ready to take your business to the next level? Contact us today! Whether you're seeking guidance, exploring new opportunities, or just have questions — our team is here to help.

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Our Success Stories
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Discover the startups that launched with Numo Hub’s support and disrupted industries. From tech to hospitality, these founders prove that the right support creates real impact.

CARDS.title: eComaster
CARDS.description: eComaster had a simple yet game-changing vision: to make procurement in the food and beverage industry smarter and faster.

CARDS.title: Hotel Plus
CARDS.description: AI-powered operating system transforming traditional hotel operations into guest-focused digital experiences.

CARDS.title: Jinas Company
CARDS.description: Jinas are storytellers with a mission to connect deeply through marketing. They craft unforgettable campaigns with Numo Hub’s support.

CARDS.title: Afaq Pro
CARDS.description: Afaq is revolutionizing hospitality through IoT—from virtual check-ins to personalized guest experiences.

CARDS.title: ROOM HOUR
CARDS.description: Room Hour enables hourly room bookings—perfect for short stays, quick getaways, or last-minute trips.

CARDS.title: ECMS (Al Murshid)
CARDS.description: ECMS helps businesses manage energy more efficiently—reducing waste and supporting sustainability.

HERO_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Workspaces
HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Where Collaboration Meets Flexibility
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Our shared workspaces offer a dynamic environment where creativity and collaboration thrive. Whether you're a startup or a growing team, we provide flexible and modern workspaces designed to boost productivity and community—so you can focus on what matters most: building your business.
